markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />command, Interact ([enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You take control of a construct. This has the effects of [_dominate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=87) with a DC of 30, but it affects only constructs. It lacks the [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) trait and functions on [mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) constructs. It also ignores any [golem antimagic](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=57) the target might have. The effect's duration ends if the baton is destroyed or leaves your possession for at least 1 minute, and you can issue commands to the target only while holding the baton.
name: command, Interact (enchantment, incapacitation)
